text: I'm not impressed by someone's degree... I'm impressed by them making movies.
author: Richard King

text: I love horror, I love scary movies, I love thrillers. If things creep you out and spook you? I love it.
author: Lana Parrilla

text: Although charismatic, James Dean is no Harrison Ford. In the majority of his movies, sooner or later he got the crap beaten out of him.
author: Dean Koontz

text: I think we're very complicated and we're capable of all kinds of things, and movies don't reflect that.
author: Ryan Gosling

text: I think it's more interesting to see people who don't feel appropriately. I relate to that, because sometimes I don't feel anything at all for things I'm supposed to, and other times I feel too much. It's not always like it is in the movies.
author: Ryan Gosling
